Appointment::getNextAppointment ( $  patient_id  ) 

foreach ($this->patient['Appointment'] as $appointment){ if ($appointment['datetime'] < currentGmt()){ $nextAppointment = $appointment; } else break; }

Appointment::suitableAppointments ( $  data  ) 

Are a patient's appointment datetimes reasonable? successive appointments should be at least MIN_SECONDS_BETWEEN_APPTS apart

Parameters:
